alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 10:37PM MST until February 15 at 10:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This warning is mainly for areas along the Idaho and Wyoming borders.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas and passes, and heed all road closures. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
